message.subject: GIR Conf. Call
message.content:
M1.1. A Conference call to discuss any comments we may want to make on the CPUC's Proposed Decision in the GIR Proceeding has been scheduled for Wednesday, Oct. 17, 2001 at 11:00 AM Houston/Omaha time and 9:00 AM California time.
[Inform: purpose, date, and time of conference call]
Sflink1.1
M1.2. The dial-in # is 1-877-795-3687 code: 350955.
[Inform: dial-in number and code]
M1.3. In Houston, Conf. Rm. 1336 has been reserved for the call.
[Inform: room where Houston end of call will take place]

message.subject: GIR Conf. Call
message.content:
M2.1. Lorraine,
[Conventional: salutation]
M2.2. I will be in a meeting during this time.
[Inform: Kim will be in a meeting during conference call time]
Blink1.1
M2.3. Will you be able to sit in on this and decide if we should participate further for our group? [Y]
[Request-Information: can Lorraine take Kim's place in this conference call]
Flink2.3
M2.4. Thanks, Kim.
[Conventional: thanks, signature]

message.subject: GIR Conf. Call
message.content:
M3.1. Michelle,
[Conventional: salutation]
M3.2. Will you be able to attend this call for our team? [Y]
[Request-Information: can Michelle attend conference call]
Blink1.1
Flink3.2
M3.3. I am in training tomorrow until noon.
[Inform: Kim is in training tomorrow until noon]
M3.4. Thanks, Kim.
[Conventional: thanks, signature]

message.subject: GIR Conf. Call
message.content:
M4.1. Please let me know how this goes. [Y]
[Request-Information: how conference call goes]
Blink1.1
Flink4.1

message.subject: GIR Conf. Call
message.content:
M5.1. FYI. SoCalGas is filing in favor of the decision adopting the settlement.
[Inform: SoCalGas is filing in favor of decision adopting settlement]

message.subject: GIR Conf. Call
message.content:
M6.1. Kimmy -
[Conventional: salutation]
M6.2. I will be in Phoenix by 11 am tomorrow.
[Inform: Lorraine will be in Phoenix at time of call tomorrow]
M6.3. Sorry.
[Inform: Lorraine is sorry she cannot participate]
Blink2.3

message.subject: GIR Conf. Call
message.content:
M7.1. It went well.
[Inform: conference call went well]
Blink4.1
M7.2. TW will file brief comments supporting the order.
[Inform: TW will file brief comments supporting an order]
M7.3. If possible, TW will try to organize a joint response from supporting parties.
[Inform: if possible, TW will try to organize a joint response from supporting parties]
